mapper.select: select u.user_id,u.username,u.password from oauth_sys_user u where u.user_id = #{userId}
select u.user_id,u.username,u.password,u.status from oauth_sys_user u where u.username = #{userName}
select role.role_sign from oauth_sys_role role left join oauth_sys_user_role urole on role.role_id = urole.role_id where urole.user_id = #{userId}

select permlist.perms from (select distinct m.perms from oauth_sys_menu m left join oauth_sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join oauth_sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} ) as permlist where permlist.perms is not null
